desserts.name: Chakka Ela Ada
desserts.description: sweet rice parcels steamed in a banana leaf loaded with bits of jackfruit & spiced with cardamom

desserts.name: Jackfruit Ice Cream
desserts.description: chunks of jackfruit pods swirled in creamy cashew ice cream, sweetened with jaggery

desserts.name: Beet Halwa
desserts.description: sweet confection of ground beets, cashews, ghee, honey, rosewater, cardamom

desserts.name: Gulab Jamun (2 pieces)
desserts.description: fried powdered milk donuts, soaked in rose flavored simple syrup, spiced with cardamom & saffron

desserts.name: Dates Apple Pradhaman
desserts.description: creamy coconut milk pudding with dates, apples, cardamom & cashews
